Welcome to Doctor Aurore WOUSSEN's website

Plastic Surgeon in Dunkirk qualified in Plastic and Aesthetic Surgery.

Dr Aurore Woussen

Passionate about surgery since always, I oriented myself a few years ago towards plastic, reconstructive and aesthetic surgery. I am graduated in microsurgery and hand surgery.

I specialized in breast surgery and breast reconstruction throughout my surgical training and continue to train each year through books, scientific articles and national congresses to follow the perpetual evolution of aesthetic and reconstructive surgery.

During my years of study, I trained and specialized at CHRU Besançon, Trévenans Hospital, Rangueil Hospital and the Oncopole cancer center in Toulouse.

The objective of my profession is to help feel in harmony with one's body by regaining femininity and self-confidence.

I practice breast surgery, body contouring surgery and facial surgery with the wish for the most natural result possible.

I also practice aesthetic medicine which is an integral part of my specialty and which allows me to respond to imperfections or prevent skin aging by giving very satisfying results without resorting to surgery.

Aesthetic surgery and medicine are complementary and allow me to offer optimal and individual care and to support each patient over the long term.
